objects

Class AbstractVCSTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.VCSObject
      • objects.AbstractVCSTree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VCSBlob, VCSTree

    public abstract class AbstractVCSTree
extends VCSObject
    Abstract class for holding object that represent some entity on disk. Entity can be a folder or a file.
    Author:
    warrior

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractVCSTree(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String diskPath, java.lang.String workingDirectory)
      Creates instance from entity which was stored on disk.
      AbstractVCSTree(java.lang.String objectHash, java.lang.String workingDirectory, java.lang.String diskPath, java.lang.String name)
      Creates instance from hashed entity which was stored on disk.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.lang.String printTree(int tab)
      Abstract method which children class must implement such that it can be printed in tree format.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the content of object in string of form "objectHash type name".
      abstract boolean writeOriginalToDisk()
      Abstract method which children classes must implement to read then write the hashed entity to disk at diskPath.

      • writeOriginalToDisk

        public abstract boolean writeOriginalToDisk()

        public abstract java.lang.String printTree(int tab)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
